H0.text: In which town in Greater Manchester is the TV series set. Bolton

H3.text: In which town in Greater Manchester is the TV series set. ROCHDALE

A4.text: Coronation Street is a televised soap opera set in Weatherfield, a fictional borough of Greater Manchester, inspired by life in Salford.
